column4: I have my windows partition on a raid-0 array controlled by an nvidia adapter that linux doesn't have a driver for. Is it possible to mount said Windows partition by setting up a software raid in linux to read the partition?
thats a level 10 difficulty linux question, btw :)
you can't mix software and hardware raid, and software raid doesn't substitute for a missing hardware raid driver, unfortunately.  be nice if it did.
